trans-unit.source: Provides a file system implementation of the <xref:System.Net.WebResponse> class.
trans-unit.target: 提供檔案系統實作的<xref:System.Net.WebResponse>類別。</xref:System.Net.WebResponse>

trans-unit.source: The FileWebResponse class implements the <xref:System.Net.WebResponse>`abstract` base class to return file system resources for the <xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest> class.
trans-unit.target: FileWebResponse 類別實作<xref:System.Net.WebResponse>`abstract`基底類別，以傳回檔案系統資源<xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest>類別。</xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest></xref:System.Net.WebResponse>

trans-unit.source: Client applications do not create FileWebResponse instances directly; instead, they are created by calling the <xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest.GetResponse%2A> method on a <xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest> instance.
trans-unit.target: 用戶端應用程式直接; 不建立 FileWebResponse 執行個體相反地，建立藉由呼叫<xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest.GetResponse%2A>方法<xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest>執行個體。</xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest> </xref:System.Net.FileWebRequest.GetResponse%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.GetResponseStream%2A> method returns a <xref:System.IO.Stream> instance that provides read-only access to a file system resource.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.GetResponseStream%2A>方法會傳回<xref:System.IO.Stream>提供唯讀存取檔案系統資源的執行個體。</xref:System.IO.Stream> </xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.GetResponseStream%2A>

trans-unit.source: The FileWebResponse class relies on the <xref:System.IO.File> class for error handling and code access security.
trans-unit.target: FileWebResponse 類別會倚賴<xref:System.IO.File>類別適用於錯誤處理和程式碼存取安全性。</xref:System.IO.File>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Net.FileWebResponse"></xref> class from the specified instances of the <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> and <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> classes.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Net.FileWebResponse"></xref>的指定執行個體從類別<xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref>和<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>類別。</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: This constructor implements the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable> interface for the <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse> class.
trans-unit.target: 這個建構函式實作的<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable>介面<xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse>類別。</xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse> </xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.ISerializable>

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> instance that contains the information required to serialize the new <xref href="System.Net.FileWebResponse"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref>包含序列化新所需的執行個體<xref href="System.Net.FileWebResponse"></xref>執行個體。

trans-unit.source: An instance of the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> class that contains the source of the serialized stream associated with the new <xref href="System.Net.FileWebResponse"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: 執行個體<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>類別，其中包含與新相關聯之序列化資料流來源<xref href="System.Net.FileWebResponse"></xref>執行個體。</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: Closes the response stream.
trans-unit.target: 關閉回應資料流。

trans-unit.source: The Close method cleans up the resources used by a <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse> and closes the response stream by calling the <xref:System.IO.Stream.Close%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Close 方法清除所使用的資源<xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse>並關閉回應資料流，藉由呼叫<xref:System.IO.Stream.Close%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法。</xref:System.IO.Stream.Close%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The response stream must be closed to avoid running out of system resources.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 必須關閉回應資料流，以避免系統資源不足。

trans-unit.source: You can closes the response stream by calling either <xref:System.IO.Stream.Close%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or Close
trans-unit.target: 您可以藉由呼叫其中一個<xref:System.IO.Stream.Close%2A?displayProperty=fullName>或是關閉</xref:System.IO.Stream.Close%2A?displayProperty=fullName>關閉回應資料流

trans-unit.source: Gets the length of the content in the file system resource.
trans-unit.target: 取得內容的長度，在檔案系統資源。

trans-unit.source: The ContentLength property contains the length, in bytes, of the file system resource.
trans-unit.target: ContentLength 屬性包含檔案系統資源的長度，以位元組為單位。

trans-unit.source: The number of bytes returned from the file system resource.
trans-unit.target: 從檔案系統資源傳回的位元組數目。

trans-unit.source: Gets the content type of the file system resource.
trans-unit.target: 取得檔案系統資源的內容類型。

trans-unit.source: The ContentType property contains the content type of the file system resource.
trans-unit.target: ContentType 屬性包含檔案系統資源的內容類型。

trans-unit.source: The value of ContentType is always "binary/octet-stream".
trans-unit.target: ContentType 的這個值一律是"二進位/八位元資料流 」。

trans-unit.source: The value "binary/octet-stream".
trans-unit.target: 「 二進位/八位元資料流 」 值。

trans-unit.source: Populates a <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> with the data needed to serialize the target object.
trans-unit.target: 於其中填入<xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref>將序列化目標物件所需的資料。

trans-unit.source: Any objects included in the <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo> are automatically tracked and serialized by the formatter.
trans-unit.target: 中所包含的任何物件<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>自動追蹤和序列化格式子。</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> to populate with data.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref>来填入資料。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> that specifies the destination for this serialization.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>，指定這個序列化的目的地。</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>

trans-unit.source: Returns the data stream from the file system resource.
trans-unit.target: 從檔案系統資源傳回的資料流。

trans-unit.source: The GetResponseStream method returns the data stream from the file system resource.
trans-unit.target: GetResponseStream 方法傳回的資料流，從檔案系統資源。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The response stream must be closed to avoid running out of system resources.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > 必須關閉回應資料流，以避免系統資源不足。

trans-unit.source: The response stream can be closed by calling <xref:System.IO.Stream.Close%2A?displayProperty=fullName> or <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.Close%2A>
trans-unit.target: 可以藉由呼叫關閉回應資料流<xref:System.IO.Stream.Close%2A?displayProperty=fullName>或<xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.Close%2A></xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.Close%2A></xref:System.IO.Stream.Close%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.IO.Stream> for reading data from the file system resource.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.IO.Stream>從檔案系統資源讀取資料。</xref:System.IO.Stream>

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of header name/value pairs associated with the response.
trans-unit.target: 取得與回應相關聯的標頭名稱/值組的集合。

trans-unit.source: The Headers property contains two name/value pairs, one for content length and one for content type, both of which are also exposed as properties, <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.ContentLength%2A> and <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.ContentType%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 標頭屬性包含兩個名稱/值組，一個用於內容長度，一個用於內容的類型，這兩種也會公開為屬性，<xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.ContentLength%2A>和<xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.ContentType%2A>。</xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.ContentType%2A> </xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.ContentLength%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Net.WebHeaderCollection> that contains the header name/value pairs associated with the response.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Net.WebHeaderCollection>，其中包含與回應相關聯的標頭名稱/值組。</xref:System.Net.WebHeaderCollection>

trans-unit.source: Gets the URI of the file system resource that provided the response.
trans-unit.target: 取得提供回應的檔案系統資源的 URI。

trans-unit.source: The ResponseUri property contains the URI of the file system resource that provided the response.
trans-unit.target: ResponseUri 屬性包含提供回應的檔案系統資源的 URI。

trans-unit.source: This is always the file system resource that was requested.
trans-unit.target: 這一定是所要求的檔案系統資源。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Uri> that contains the URI of the file system resource that provided the response.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Uri>，其中包含提供回應的檔案系統資源的 URI。</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.Headers*> property is supported by the <xref href="System.Net.FileWebResponse"></xref> instance.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出是否<xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.Headers*>支援屬性<xref href="System.Net.FileWebResponse"></xref>執行個體。</xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.Headers*>

trans-unit.source: This property is always true for [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性一定是 true。 [!INCLUDE[net_v45](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref:System.Boolean>.
trans-unit.target: 傳回<xref:System.Boolean>.</xref:System.Boolean>

trans-unit.source: true if the <xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.Headers*> property is supported by the <xref href="System.Net.FileWebResponse"></xref> instance; otherwise, false.
trans-unit.target: true，否則<xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.Headers*>支援屬性<xref href="System.Net.FileWebResponse"></xref>執行個體; 否則為 false。</xref:System.Net.FileWebResponse.Headers*>

trans-unit.source: Populates a <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> instance with the data needed to serialize the <xref href="System.Net.FileWebResponse"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 於其中填入<xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref>序列化所需的資料執行個體<xref href="System.Net.FileWebResponse"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"></xref> , which will hold the serialized data for the <xref href="System.Net.FileWebResponse"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Runtime.Serialization.SerializationInfo"> </xref> ，將含有序列化的資料<xref href="System.Net.FileWebResponse"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext> containing the destination of the serialized stream associated with the new <xref href="System.Net.FileWebResponse"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>包含與新相關聯之序列化資料流目的地<xref href="System.Net.FileWebResponse"> </xref>。</xref:System.Runtime.Serialization.StreamingContext>
